Class Channel1 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----Channel1
public class Channel1
extends Object
Channel 1. Simulates reading cards from the card reader by reading records from a file. Each line is a record.

Version:
10.10.1998, 12.06.1998
Author:
Ethan Georgi

Channel1(BufferPool, CPU)
Constructor.

cleanUp()
House cleaning for the Interrupt Routine.
done()
Is it time to raise an interrupt yet?
getTimer()
What's the timer set at?
incClock()
Increment the clock.
isBusy()
Is channel 1 busy, slaving away, or otherwise occupied?
read()
Reads a card from the cardReader and puts it in an InputFullBuffer
setBusy()
Tell Channel1 to get back to work, slave!

Channel1 
 public Channel1(BufferPool bp,
                 CPU cpu)
Constructor.

Parameters:
bp - Reference to the Buffer Pool
cpu - Reference to the CPU

What's the timer set at?

read 
 public void read()
Reads a card from the cardReader and puts it in an InputFullBuffer
